lead_paragraph: A former Iranian diplomat says Iran “responds positively” to diplomacy but becomes “aggressive and inflexible” in the face of coercion.

headline.main: Dealing With Iran: The Key Word Is ‘Respect’
headline.print_headline: Dealing With Iran: The Key Word Is ‘Respect’

snippet: A former Iranian diplomat says Iran “responds positively” to diplomacy but becomes “aggressive and inflexible” in the face of coercion.
